dc:title: Notes By The Way - October 1943
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Exuberant description of a month spent at a Grail folk school where work, crafts, prayer, meditation, liturgies, lectures, and fasting intermingled. Includes her notes of presentations on the Mass, liturgical singing, and the psalms.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 396 1943-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
